import "./App.css" import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' function twoDecimals(x) { return Number.parseFloat(x).toFixed(2); } function App() { const [total, setTotal] = useState(0) const [cartItems, setCartItems] = useState({}) const addItemToCart = (price, itemName) => { setTotal(twoDecimals(total + price)) } return (
Your cart
Total: {total}

Starbuzz coffee beverages

House Blend, $1.49

A smooth, mild blend of coffee

addItemToCart(1.49, 'House Blend')}>Add to cart

Mocha Caffe Latte, $2.35

Espresso, steamed with milk and chocolate syrup

Add to cart

Cappucino, $1.89

A mixture of espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam

Add to cart

Chai Tea, $1.85

A drink made with black tea, milk, and honey

Add to cart
) } export default App
